New Records: Kendry Páez, 17, scores in Ecuador win at the age of 17
Key Match Events: Piero Hincapié scored in the 13th minute
Kendry Páez scored in the 45'+4' minute
Alan Minda scored in the 90'+1' minute
Michail Antonio scored in the 54th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador kept their hopes of qualifying for the Copa America quarter-finals alive
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador won 3-1 over Jamaica in Las Vegas on Wednesday
Jamaica left on the brink of elimination
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA
Ecuador's win was their first in the group stage
